languages.text: "Кровавая весталка, я видел, как ты билась сама с собой. Тяжелое испытание, изуверское — истинное коварство ксеносов".
"Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."
languages.original_text: "Кровавая весталка, я видел, как ты билась сама с собой. Тяжелое испытание, изуверское — истинное коварство ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."
"Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."
"Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."
"Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."
"Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

languages.text: "Blutwahrsagerin, ich habe Euch gegen Euch selbst kämpfen sehen. Eine harte Prüfung, eine brutale Prüfung — dies ist die wahre Tücke der Xenos."
languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

traits.locale_text: "Blutwahrsagerin, ich habe Euch gegen Euch selbst kämpfen sehen. Eine harte Prüfung, eine brutale Prüfung — dies ist die wahre Tücke der Xenos."

languages.text: « Je vous ai regardée vous battre contre vous-même, augure de sang. Une mise à l'épreuve aussi ardue que brutale, et l'illustration parfaite de la véritable perversité des xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai regardée vous battre contre vous-même, augure de sang. Une mise à l'épreuve aussi ardue que brutale, et l'illustration parfaite de la véritable perversité des xénos. »

languages.text: «Vidente de sangre, la he visto luchar contra sí misma. Una prueba difícil y brutal. Esa es la verdadera astucia de los xenos».
languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

traits.locale_text: «Vidente de sangre, la he visto luchar contra sí misma. Una prueba difícil y brutal. Esa es la verdadera astucia de los xenos».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスクライヤー、お前が自分自身と戦うのを見てきた。厳しい試練であり、残酷な試練でもある…これが異種族の真の狡猾さだ」
languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスクライヤー、お前が自分自身と戦うのを見てきた。厳しい試練であり、残酷な試練でもある…これが異種族の真の狡猾さだ」

languages.text: “鲜血的占卜师，我看到了你与你自己战斗的样子。那是场艰难的试炼，也是场残酷的试炼，这就是异形真正的邪恶之处。”
languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

traits.locale_text: “鲜血的占卜师，我看到了你与你自己战斗的样子。那是场艰难的试炼，也是场残酷的试炼，这就是异形真正的邪恶之处。”

languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."

languages.text: "Kan kâhini, kendine karşı verdiğin mücadeleyi izledim. Zorlu, amansız bir testti. İşte bu, zenoların hakiki sapkınlığıdır."
languages.original_text: "Blood scryer, I have watched you do battle with yourself. A hard test, a brutal test — this is the true deviousness of the xenos."
